meanings.sent1: The cake was divided into sixtieths for all the guests to have a fair share.
meanings.sent2: She marked off the land into sixtieths to accurately measure the property.
meanings.sent3: The teacher handed out sixtieths of the puzzle pieces, making the students work together to complete it.
meanings.sent4: In the game, each player controlled a sixtieth of the army, strategizing to conquer the virtual world.
meanings.sent5: The sixtieths of the rainbow colors blended beautifully in the sky after the rain.

meanings.definition: The ordinal number corresponding to sixty in a series.
meanings.sent1: Her birthday fell on the sixtieths day of the year, making it a special celebration.
meanings.sent2: He was the sixtieths person to cross the finish line in the marathon.
meanings.sent3: The sixtieths student to arrive at the party won a prize for being fashionably late.
meanings.sent4: The library book had the sixtieths page missing, leaving the story incomplete.
meanings.sent5: On the sixtieths floor of the building, there was a breathtaking view of the city skyline.
